body:
So i changed my optifine cape a couple of times and then it logged out me out of my minecraft account and it wont let me log back in. i req a new password but the email for the new password wont come so i legit dunno what to do. 

the email hasnt gone into junk or i havent miss opened or something ive checked

so yeah if anyone can help me with this that would be great thanks

replies.body:
Did you contact this link?: https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/emails/new?ref=footer

If so, you should receive an answer within a week or two. Same thing happened to me so I filled in that form and they responded within a week :P

GL rip
